story.title: Prisoner
story.storyDescription: Prisoner3282: I should have known you would put messaging systems in your cells.

messages.text: I should have known you would put messaging systems in your cells.
Is this the latest way to torment your prisoners?
Torment? My dear, this is the most convenient method of communication.
Convenient for you. The only thing worse than being trapped in a room with a datapad connected to you would be for you to be in here yourself.
What if I hack this and send out an emergency call?
You and I both know that youâ€™re not bright enough to do that, your highness.
Then I suppose that makes you smart enough to call me out on my bluffs.
I will take that as a compliment.
Is this your idea of fun? Insulting your prisoners through the datapads, not even giving them the dignity of showing your face?
I have better things to do than to discuss frivolities with you face-to-face, your highness.
Such as?
Discussing your ransom with the greater intergalactic community. Youâ€™re causing quite a fuss, Iâ€™ll have you know.
News reports reaching all the way to the edges of the planetary system.
As they should.
Donâ€™t be arrogant, Princess. Weâ€™re far from any help. Your friends have no chance of finding us.
Iâ€™m thrilled.
So tell me. How much ransom is this little stunt going to rack up for you space pirates? Five million?
You greatly overestimate your importance.
What, so three million?
Enough that, if they refuse, you are not worth negotiating.
What!?
We will simply dispose of you through the garbage shoot.
How comforting. Glad to see that all your efforts could literally go to waste.
I should get captured more often.
My puns become priceless.
Myra?
Myra, can you see this?
Donâ€™t react!
And donâ€™t answer me!
Believe me, nothing would give me more pleasure than to see the life sucked out of you as your pieces scatter through space.
If you can see this, scratch your ear with your left hand.
Amazing!! Myra, this is Zahra. The space pirates donâ€™t know that Iâ€™ve hacked their messaging system AND their video surveillance. Only your screen can see this. Iâ€™m on the ship.
What, speechless? This must be a first.
Keep talking to Finn like nothing has changed, but listen to me closely. Iâ€™m going to get you out of here. But you have to do exactly as I say.
...This definitely is a first.
However, there is one way I may be willing to make compromises regarding your case.
Lower your ransom.
Give you back with your limbs intact.
I highly doubt I want to hear this.
Well, Iâ€™ve ensured only the greatest comfort in your cell, your highness.
If you can think of a clever way to use your luxurious four-poster bed, I would be far more convinced to take you back to Earth only slightly soiled.
Youâ€™ve got to be kidding me.
Itâ€™s a tempting offer, is it not?
I could offer to spit you out into space right now if you do not agree, but I am certainly more of a gentleman than that.
For now.
Iâ€™m not afraid of you.
But you ARE attracted to me.
How dare you!!
Come now, your highness, donâ€™t deny your feelings.
Shut your mouth.
I will NEVER accept your offer, do you hear me?
I would rather be ripped into tiny pieces and vacuum-sucked into space.
I would rather run this entire ship into the next black hole we pass.
I would rather never see my family again.
Oh, I see.
Youâ€™re the speechless one now.
I hope Iâ€™ve made myself clear, and if I havenâ€™t:
Go to hell, you down-low, dirty, infuriating pile of shit!!
You tell him, Myra!
...What?
Just used the air vents to sneak into Captain Finnâ€™s main office!
Knocked him out cold while he was chatting with you, so thanks for the distraction.
Oh thank God, Zahra!! Be careful, heâ€™s got pirates swarming the ship. Donâ€™t let them catch you!
Donâ€™t worry about me, big sis. I just need to figure out where the controls to your cell are.
They must be around here -
Oh no heâ€™s waking up
Zahra?
Zahra??
Oh god oh no no no no
Zahra please talk to me please
Donâ€™t let him get you too!!
Your little sister is quite skilled at combat but she is no match for me.
What an asshole Myra. Donâ€™t worry I got this
Please. This pathetic excuse for royalty has no chance
ARE YOU TWO FIGHTING OVER THE SAME DATAPAD AND INSTANT MESSAGING ME MID-COMBAT?
ARE YOU INSANE?
PAY ATTENTION FOR THE LOVE OF GOD.
Seriously, if you two hadnâ€™t been communicating with me, this fight would be over by now.
30 minutes later...
Wait
Wait is it over??
Oh god
I didnâ€™t actually mean for you two to stop talking to me.
Someone say something!!
Finn?
Zahra??
Myra Iâ€™m here. Gave Finn a blaster right to the heart. He wonâ€™t be waking up now.
ZAHRA YOUâ€™RE ALL RIGHT
Iâ€™m opening up your cell and executing permissions for one of the escape pods.
Meet me on the first floor, starboard side. Itâ€™s just down the hall from your cells.
What if Iâ€™m caught??
Myra. I just killed the captain of the biggest fleet of space pirates in the galaxy. If I can do that, you can run down the hallway.
Your cell should be opening now!
It is!!
Good! Meet me at the escape pod. Itâ€™s time to get us home!
